mapper.select: SELECT * FROM eduinfo WHERE e_mensa_no = 1 AND e_name LIKE #{m_cname}
mapper.insert: insert into mmso_member2(m_id, m_pass, name, m_email, m_birthday, m_gender, m_cname, m_number, m_regdate, active, m_type, m_gisa, m_schoolname, m_class, m_no, b_idx) values(#{m_id}, #{m_pass}, #{name}, #{m_email}, #{m_birthday}, #{m_gender}, #{m_cname}, #{m_number}, sysdate(),0, 1, #{m_gisa}, #{m_schoolname}, #{m_class}, #{m_no}, #{b_idx})
